tool.name: RaceID outlier detection
tool.command:
Rscript '@SCRIPT_DIR@/raceID_outlierdetect.R' '@SCRIPT_DIR@' '$rconf_source' && mkdir '${out_html.files_path}' && cp plot_*.png '${out_html.files_path}' && echo 'RaceID Outlier Detection


' > '$out_html'

param.name: inp_rdat
param.label: Count matrix (R SCseq object)
param.help: This file can be generated from a spreadsheet via the RaceID filter tool, but should preferably be the output of the RaceID kmeans tool.

param.name: outminc
param.label: Expression cutoff threshold for outlier genes

param.name: probthr
param.label: Probability threshold of observing a given gene expression level in a cell
param.help: If lower than this cutoff, the cell is considered an outlier for this gene.

param.name: outlg
param.label: Minimal number of outlier genes required to flag an outlier cells

param.name: outdistquant
param.label: Merge cells into outlier clusters if their similarity exceeds this quantile in a similarity distribution for all cell pairs

tool.help: This module performs outlier detection by calibrating against a background noise model within each cluster, and searching for cells that fall outside of the transcript count distribution for that gene (modelled as a negative binomial). Cells that are outliers for more than a user-set amount of genes are suspected as being outlier cells.
